org.opends.server.protocols.http

Interface LDAPContext.InternalConnectionFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    LDAPContext

    public static interface LDAPContext.InternalConnectionFactory
    An internal connection factory providing direct connection to this Directory Server without the network overhead.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connection getAuthenticatedConnection(Entry userEntry)
      Get a direct Connection to this Directory Server.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticatedConnection

        Connection getAuthenticatedConnection(Entry userEntry)
                               throws LdapException
        Get a direct Connection to this Directory Server.
        Parameters:
        userEntry - The returned connection will be authenticated as userEntry.
        Returns:
        A direct Connection to this Directory Server.
        Throws:
        LdapException - If a connection cannot be created (i.e: because an administrative limit has been exceeded).
